sentences.en: Ada had a wrinkled, simian face.
sentences.cn: 埃达有一张布满皱纹、长得像猿猴的脸。

sentences.en: Cannong licensing Simian fiber tough, shiny white color and without any impurities.
sentences.cn: 蚕农牌丝绵纤维强韧 、 颜色洁白光泽好、无任何杂质.

sentences.en: Curiosity is the taproot of an intellectual life , the most valuable of our simian traits.
sentences.cn: 好奇是高智生命的根源，也是我们类人猿特征中最有价值的部分。

sentences.en: Objective To establish the ELBA for detection of antibody to simian B virus.
sentences.cn: 目的建立猴B病毒抗体ELISA检测方法.

sentences.en: Or perhaps the image came not from humans, but from some natural-history programme about our simian relatives, who spend much of their time literally nit-picking as part of grooming.
sentences.cn: 或者，捉虱子卵这种行为并非来自我们人类，而是来自人类的近亲类人猿的某些自然现象，作为清洁的一部分，它们确实花费了大量时间捉虱子卵。

sentences.en: Routine genetic sequencing of the virus showed it looked like no other sample of AIDS virus and it was eventually compared to a gorilla simian immunodeficiency virus, itself only discovered in 2006.
sentences.cn: 病毒常规基因序列表明与其它艾滋病病毒样本看上去不一样并且它最终与仅在2006年发现的一大猩猩猿免疫缺陷病毒比对。

sentences.en: Simian and Simian products manufacturing sales; Dried and silk products, Chinese chestnut, oil - bearing crops, medicines procurement.
sentences.cn: 丝棉及丝棉制品制造销售; 干茧及丝副产品 、 板栗 、 油料作物 、 中药材购销.

trans.tran_cn: 类人猿的，像类人猿的，像猴的
